info.title: HyperscaleCitusManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL resources including clusters, servers, configurations, firewall rules, roles, private endpoint connections and private link resources.

get.description: List all the clusters in a given subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the clusters in a given resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new cluster with servers.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a cluster together with servers in it.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing cluster. The request body can contain one to many of the properties present in the normal cluster definition.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters for updating a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a server in cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the configurations of a server in cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the configurations of a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information of a configuration for coordinator and nodes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Updates configuration of coordinator in a cluster

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating a cluster configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Updates configuration of nodes in a cluster

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating a cluster configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new firewall rule or updates an existing firewall rule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a cluster firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the firewall rules in a given cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new role or updates an existing role.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a role.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the roles in a given cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check the availability of name for resource

parameters.name: nameAvailabilityRequest
parameters.description: The required parameters for checking if resource name is available.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets list of private endpoint connections on a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a specified private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Approve or reject a private endpoint connection with a given name.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for approving a private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a private endpoint connection with a given name.

204.description: Private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the private link resources for cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a private link resource for cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

storageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB.

vCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 64).

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the server.

enablePublicIp.description: If public IP is requested or not for a server.

ServerNameItem.description: The name object for a server.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

ClusterServerProperties.description: The properties of a server in cluster.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

role.description: The role of server in the cluster.

state.description: A state of a cluster/server that is visible to user.

haState.description: A state of HA feature for the cluster.

availabilityZone.description: Availability Zone information of the server.

ClusterServer.description: Represents a server in a cluster.

properties.description: The properties of a server in a cluster.

ClusterServerListResult.description: A list of servers in a cluster.

value.description: The list of servers in a cluster.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

ClusterPropertiesForUpdate.description: The properties used to update a cluster.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login.

postgresqlVersion.description: The PostgreSQL version of the cluster.

citusVersion.description: The Citus version of the cluster.

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If shards on coordinator is enabled or not for the cluster.

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the cluster.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary zone for the cluster

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of the coordinator (default: GeneralPurpose).

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of the coordinator in MB.

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of the coordinator (max: 64).

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for the coordinator.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster. When node count is 0, it represents a coordinator with the ability to create distributed tables on that node. Node count value can not be 1.

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a node in MB.

nodeVCores.description: The vCores count of a node (max: 64).

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a node.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of cluster list.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

ClusterProperties.description: The properties used to create a new cluster.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login. Required for creation.

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If shards on coordinator is enabled or not for the cluster.

earliestRestoreTime.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster.

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the cluster.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary zone for the cluster

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of the coordinator (default: GeneralPurpose). Required for creation.

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of the coordinator in MB. Required for creation.

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of the coordinator (max: 64). Required for creation.

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for the coordinator.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster. When node count is 0, it represents a coordinator with the ability to create distributed tables on that node. Node count value can not be 1.

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a node in MB.

nodeVCores.description: The vCores count of a node (max: 64).

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a node.

sourceResourceId.description: The source resource id to restore from. It's required for 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica' operations

sourceLocation.description: The source cluster location to restore from. It's required for 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica' operations

ClusterResponse.description: Represents a cluster in response body.

properties.description: Properties of the cluster response body.

ClusterResponseProperties.description: Properties of the cluster response body.

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of the servers in the cluster.

state.description: A state of a cluster/server that is visible to user.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary zone for the cluster

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If shards on coordinator is enabled or not for the cluster.

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the server.

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of a coordinator server (default: GeneralPurpose).

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB.

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 64).

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a server.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node server (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB.

nodeVCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 64).

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a server.

serverNames.description: The list of server names in the cluster

sourceResourceId.description: The resource id of source cluster for read replica clusters.

sourceLocation.description: The location of source cluster for read replica clusters.

readReplicas.description: The array of read replica clusters.

earliestRestoreTime.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The private endpoint connections for a cluster.

customWindow.description: indicates whether custom window is enabled or disabled

dayOfWeek.description: day of week for maintenance window

serverRoleGroupConfigurations.description: The list of server role group configuration values.

Configuration.description: Represents configuration details for coordinator and node.

ServerRoleGroupConfiguration.description: Represents server role group configuration value.

role.description: The role of servers in the server role group.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

value.description: Represents the value of a configuration.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

FirewallRuleProperties.description: The properties of a cluster firewall rule.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address of the cluster firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address of the cluster firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

properties.description: The properties of a firewall rule.

value.description: The list of firewall rules in a cluster.

password.description: The password of the cluster role.

RoleProperties.description: The properties of a cluster role.

value.description: The list of roles in a cluster.

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

OperationListResult.description: A list of resource provider operations.

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the resource name is available.
